text:
Attention all UIC students (undergraduate and/or graduate): 
Want to help motivate & mobilize people to get vaccinated? 
Visit https://t.co/vwK9fUEWqY to learn about the Vaccine Uptake Public Awareness Campaign Contest, and consider getting a team together!
#COVID19 #vaccine #UIC https://t.co/eybKT8KxIu
